scripts.build: next build && next export && yarn postexport
scripts.link-hooks: cd node_modules/react && yarn link && cd ../react-query && yarn link && cd ../react-dom && yarn link && cd ../jotai && yarn link && cd ../.. && yarn link @pooltogether/hooks
